xzaxgIpKwYQ#0#PL_oohi_O51Z_lORk8SCG_4x1s: is crucial to understand the effect of regulations and possible changes in financial intermediation on monetary policy implementation and transmission

the impressive conference program covers the following topics in three sessions monetary policy implementation the transmission of monetary policy and the effective regulation and financial intermediation on monetary policy implementation and transmission the presentations and discussions of the 12 academic papers on the conference program will surely provide a foundation for what I expect will be stimulating discussion of important topics over the next two days
looking ahead to later today I'm delighted that vice-chairman fisher will deliver keynote remarks on the exchange rate mechanism
